title: Does anyone think that the master yi critical strike problem will be fixed?

embed.description: Having seen Cowsep's recent Shyvana oneshot vids I've had the idea of autos doing huge amounts of damage on my mind: Shyvana obviously with her...

body: It seems like critical strikes on master yi are really bugged and aren't working properly. Does anyone think that riot will actually fix this problem?
